pli-tv-bu-vb-sk42:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk42:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bhuñjamānā sabbaṃ hatthaṃ mukhe pakkhipanti …
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk42:1.3: “Na bhuñjamāno sabbaṃ hatthaṃ mukhe pakkhipissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk42:1.4: Na bhuñjamānena sabbo hattho mukhe pakkhipitabbo.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk42:1.5: Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca bhuñjamāno sabbaṃ hatthaṃ mukhe pakkhipati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
